website_summaries.verdict: Uses a bamboo base in the material in the wipes for extra moisture and extra strength to avoid tears in the wipe.
pros: Good price-per-wipe as the package contains more wipes than other brands
Uses a hypoallergenic design and is fragrance-free to make it safer to use for both pets and humans
cons: Packaging is a little awkward to use
Measures 6-inches by 9-inches, so it's not as large as some other brands

customer_reviews.title: Keep finding weird materials on some sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are great wipes - good size, good dispenser, I like the unscented...BUT I keep finding these weird sheets in the package that appear to be like ends of their rolls or sheets with stiff red metal or plastic ? ends...which suggests that their quality control steps are a little questionable. So far I have found three sheets with these weird materials in them. Can’t wipe my (fur) baby’s butt with these...
customer_reviews.author: 3kpsi

customer_reviews.title: A bit small but works for teacup and small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to give my senior dog a little wipe down after "accidents". She is a large dog so it does take a few to do her whole body. Also wanted them for my small dogs on camping trips. Great for cleaning small paws. They smell great, but not over powering. Would have given 5 stars of they were bigger in size.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Takes water-based paint off
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on my long haired cat who doesn't always groom herself well. They work well on her, and they also helped when my dog ran through my paint tray of red paint when I was painting my dining room wall. The paw prints looked like she was fleeing a crime scene! It took a bit of scrubbing, but I was able to get all of the paint off of her using these wipes. They also work well for cleaning dirty paws when my dog comes inside and for wiping off tear stains. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: WintrySarah

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I like how these wipes clean the paws of my puppy! They are not too wet, so they clean very nicely. They don’t make your skin dry. The biggest flaw is how they are packaged. Getting a new wipe from the box is impossible. Otherwise this product is great and the puppy is clean!
customer_reviews.author: Anna-Maria

customer_reviews.title: Smell good
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my pitbull. She loves to get her paws dirty and are the perfect size for that. The smell isn’t overpowering either, it’s very pleasant. I would definitely recommend them over baby wipes or other dog wipes I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: My favortite pet care wipes
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are by far my favorite grooming wipes for my felines. Other products tend to cause a "wet cat" smell on them despite the fragrance of the wipe. There is a light, almost unnoticeable smell from this product that I love. My kitties are 90% indoor, but I let them come outside when I am there and these are perfect for freshening them up or removing dirt from their paws. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle J Pitre

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my puppy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the wipes to help keep our new puppy clean after bathroom visits outside. They worked great for his paws. We also used them for his fur to spot clean between baths. They are unscented and didn't dry out my hands. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: aakord9

customer_reviews.title: Did it job cleaning paws daily after walks
customer_reviews.text: worked great for wipe paws after walks and a quick clean of dirty eyes and wipe down of hair in between baths
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sawka

customer_reviews.title: Work great on my dog who hates to take a bath
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my dog who hates to take a bath, quick wipe down with these and less baths, he is happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Tina French

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these wipes! We’ve been using them since Zanzi was a pup and we continue to use them on the daily. Rain or shine, grass or dirt, we use them for anything and everything. They’re delicate on the skin and super pet-friendly. We carry a little pack of them everywhere just in case of an accident or requiring tidying/freshening up!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Cagol

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many different wipes for our dog but these are the best for her. They calm her itching at night. She looks forward to the wipe down every night. I wish they we slightly larger because she is so happy and moving a lot that sometimes we drop them. The seal is great they don’t try out at all. I highly recommend them and we buy them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Lundgren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These do a great job cleaning kittens, and are inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K. Paa

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes
customer_reviews.text: I use these in between grooming and muddy days. Great product my dog is allergic to everything.
customer_reviews.author: Bostondw

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this package, great deal. Smells good bit scent doesn't seem to last. Convenient for wiping off my senior girl when she has light leaks
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, clean, strong, unscented pet wipes
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. No scent, no preservatives, eco-friendly bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my French bulldog puppy with sensitive skin! Wipes are thin but durable and super moist to get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Pet wipes
customer_reviews.text: Scent is wonderful. A little difficult to pull out but I manage.
customer_reviews.author: Josie V. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Good, good, good,great!
customer_reviews.text: great! good price, good product, great packaging! package stays shut when closed keeping wipes moist, no waste!
customer_reviews.author: Krummy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes just somewhat difficult getting them out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Dan the Man

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Great convenience when I need to wipe down my dirty “beach” dog.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wipes for our bulldog
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wipes. They don’t tear easily and have a subtle but nice scent. We use them on our bulldog and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Célestine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not enough moisture, had to add some water to use. Wouldn’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy4SHERMAN!

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like these wipes because they are quick and easy to get off the extra hair of my cat. I also clean my cats ears with these since they are easier than other cleaning methods. Over all I recommend these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on my pups and found them to be the right size, pup loves them, smell is wonderful and calming.
customer_reviews.author: CLS

customer_reviews.title: Great for little paws
customer_reviews.text: Great for little paws. But you will need 4 for a big dog.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed when my dog needs a light clean up in between baths!!
customer_reviews.author: MSL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dog that cant be bathed!
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog that cant be bathed so we use the wipes. They work great, leaves him smelling great! And....he loves the bath
customer_reviews.author: Carebear

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very thin wipes. It is cheaper, but you have to use several wipes to get paws cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: O B M B

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, that one we receive on the mail are not the same on the description! I want my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: marygrace

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 14lb terrier. I love that they are natural and not full of perfumes. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: BRANDY C.

customer_reviews.title: Too thin and not effective wipes
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are too thin. It doesn’t seem to be able to clean my dog very well. Not buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Best pet wipes
customer_reviews.text: They are probably the best pet wipes we have ever had. We allow our dog to sleep in our bed at night, however we do wipe her down with these wipes before bed. They don't have an over-powering scent and clean her up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Wipe for dog
customer_reviews.text: wipe feet when coming in the house. Not real wet but wipes well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank W.

customer_reviews.title: These pet wipes actually work and help eliminate the bad smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but these wipes are awesome!! I have used everything for my Ragdoll mix she doesn't clean her behind. None of the other wipes helped with the smell or cleaned her behind well at all. These clean her so well and they help to eliminate that awful smell it's amazing!! Thank you for making these!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very small size, pretty dry and not thick material.
customer_reviews.text: It can hardly clean even the foot of my dog. Waste of money and won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Yiting Xiao

product_meta.title: Pet Grooming Wipes for Dogs & Cats (Pack of 120) Fragrance-Free, Cleans, Deodorizes & Hypo-Allergenic
feature_bullets: INGREDIENTS: Water, Polysorbate 20, Ethylparaben, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Alkyl Polyglycoside, Methylparaben, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, Propylene Glycol, Witch Hazel Extract.
DIMENSIONS: Each wipe is 9 inches x 6 inches and contain 120 wipes per package.

SAFE: The wipes are Hypo-Allergenic, Fragrance-Free, and formulated for sensitive skin. Plus, daily wipe downs will remove outdoor allergens from your dog’s coat, making this an excellent product to combat pet dander and unpleasant smells. Great for small to large dogs.

FRESH & CLEAN: Our Pet Wipes clean your pet, restore your pet's coat, moisturizes, soothes and relieves. They also remove surface dirt, sand, mud, and dirt floating on top of your pet’s coat. They’re incredibly helpful for cleaning small areas such as dirty paws or mud on your dog’s muzzle and are terrific for spot cleaning.
ECO- FRIENDLY: Totally earth friendly; the bamboo base allows the wipes to break down quickly (you won’t find them in a landfill).
